Text: twentyforty is awesome! keep up the good work!
What is the real reason for pirate bay showing zero seeds on all the torrents ?

@DWinchester: TPB get that data from the tracker (separate server) and that is openbitorrent dot com (process of getting data from tracker is called "scratching"). In past few weeks this tracker is down most of the time. Leaving aside technical problems, HollyBolly try everything possible to shut down all  tracker servers thinking that it would stop or cripple P2P sharing. Well... crippling is what you've experienced, but DHT was invented to overcome that need. For DHT instead of  public tracker servers (lately 99% is down more than up) one should use uTorrent/BitTorrent or similar torrent programs with modern and good DHT abilities and open one dedicated UDP port in the router/modem.
